item.title: 酱油生产商海天据称酝酿 15 亿美元香港上市
item.description: 中国最大的调味品生产商之一佛山海天调味食品股份有限公司正考虑在香港进行第二次上市，据熟悉情况的人士称，这次上市至少可以融资 15 亿美元。【原文：Foshan Haitian Flavouring & Food Co., one of the biggest condiment makers in China, is considering a second listing in Hong Kong that could raise at least $1.5 billion, people familiar with the situation said.】

item.title: 分析师推崇英国银行股，称其为保护收益的对冲工具
item.description: 由于英国公司对冲固定收益的方式，利率上调带来的提振作用会持续更长时间，分析师对英国表现不佳的银行股的看法也变得更加积极。【原文：Analysts are turning more positive on the UK’s underperforming bank stocks, with the boost from higher interest rates seen lingering for longer due to the way British firms hedge their fixed-income earnings.】

item.title: 人工智能热潮引发澳大利亚养老基金向 DataBank 下注 20 亿美元
item.description:
数据中心开发商在美国建设三座大型设施的计划得到了澳大利亚超级保险公司（AustralianSuper）和数字桥公司（DigitalBridge）的支持。【原文：

The data center developer’s push to build out three large US facilities is being backed by AustralianSuper and DigitalBridge.

】

item.title: 马伦和威特科夫支持迈阿密博物馆价值 2500 万美元的建筑交易
item.description: Pretium 首席执行官唐-马伦（Don Mullen）和他的妻子阿曼达（Amanda）出资 2,500 万美元，支持一家免费向公众开放的艺术博物馆购买迈阿密的一栋建筑。【原文：Pretium Chief Executive Officer Don Mullen and his wife, Amanda, have helped to back the $25 million purchase of a Miami building by an art museum that’s free to the public.】

item.title: 中国政府承诺提供支持后，中国住建部计划举行情况通报会
item.description: 中国住房部将于周四召开新闻发布会，可能会提供更多有关支持中国下滑的房地产行业和促进经济增长的措施细节。【原文：China’s housing ministry will hold a press briefing on Thursday, likely providing more details of measures to support the country’s slumping property sector and bolster economic growth.】

item.title: 阿美取消沙特化工项目，专注亚洲市场
item.description: 沙特阿美石油公司（Saudi Aramco）取消了在沙特王国建设炼油厂和化工项目的计划，并正在审查其他三个项目，因为该公司正在评估支出计划，重点是拓展亚洲市场。【原文：Saudi Aramco has canceled plans to build a refinery and chemicals project in the kingdom and is reviewing three others as it evaluates spending plans with a focus on expanding in Asia.】

item.title: 石油缓解通胀担忧，国债创两周最大涨幅
item.description: 由于油价下跌缓解了人们对通胀回升的担忧，国债创两周来最大涨幅。【原文：Treasuries rallied the most in two weeks as tumbling oil prices eased concerns about an uptick in inflation.】

item.title: 航运业可以制定更清晰的绿色发展路线
item.description:
围绕生物燃料的热潮不应分散船东、经纪人和港口的注意力，他们需要找到清理全球贸易主干线的方法。【原文：

The excitement around biofuels shouldn’t distract owners, brokers and ports from the need to find a way to clean up the backbone of global trade.

】

item.title: 以色列经济增长下调，战争造成严重损失
item.description: 由于以色列与哈马斯在加沙的持续战争以及与真主党的交战给经济造成的损失比之前想象的要严重，以色列下调了第二季度的经济增长。【原文：Israel revised down second-quarter growth as its ongoing war with Hamas in Gaza and fighting with Hezbollah took a heavier toll on the economy than previously thought.】

item.title: 道达尔将支持莫桑比克液化天然气终端以促进天然气进口
item.description: 道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）的目标是明年批准在莫桑比克建立液化天然气进口终端，以帮助邻国南非的用户避免潜在的供应危机。【原文：TotalEnergies SE aims to next year approve an import terminal for liquefied natural gas in Mozambique that may help users in neighboring South Africa avoid a potential supply crisis.】

item.title: 道富首席财务官 Eric Aboaf 将离开公司另谋高就
item.description: 道富公司首席财务官 Eric Aboaf 将于二月离职，另谋银行业以外的新工作。【原文：State Street Corp.’s Chief Financial Officer Eric Aboaf will leave the company in February for a new opportunity outside of banking.】

item.title: 巴克莱银行挑战汽车贷款裁决，数十亿资金岌岌可危
item.description: 巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）就其汽车贷款行为向伦敦法院提起诉讼，该银行表示，此案将对英国银行可能面临的数十亿英镑的巨额债务产生影响。【原文：Barclays Plc kicked off a London court challenge over its car loan practices, in a case that the lender said has implications for a potential multi-billion pound bill facing Britain’s banks.】

item.title: 松下售价 565 美元的电吹风物有所值评测
item.description: 如果你的伴侣因为你买了游戏机而不高兴，不妨试试这个系列：它还是比吹风机便宜。但首先...【原文：If your partner’s unhappy that you bought a game console, try this line: It’s still cheaper than a hair dryer. But first...】

item.title: 据说 QIA 将加入 UFC 竞争对手 Group One 的 5000 万美元融资回合
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，综合格斗品牌 One Championship 背后的公司 Group One Holdings 从包括卡塔尔投资局在内的投资者那里筹集了至少 5000 万美元。【原文：Group One Holdings, the company behind mixed martial arts brand One Championship, raised at least $50 million from investors including Qatar Investment Authority, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 股价下跌后，辉瑞从 Covid 明星变成激进主义目标
item.description: 辉瑞公司（Pfizer Inc. ）和阿尔伯特-布尔拉（Albert Bourla）在与 Starboard Value LP 的早期争斗中占了上风；但这家制药商及其陷入困境的首席执行官面临着一场与不甘失败的激进分子的持久战。【原文：Pfizer Inc. and Albert Bourla got the upper hand in an early skirmish against Starboard Value LP — but the drugmaker and its embattled chief executive face a long war against an activist that hates to lose.】

item.title: 穆迪称银行对私人信贷的风险正在上升
item.description: 穆迪评级公司（Moody's Ratings）的一份报告显示，银行正在通过为这一价值 1.7 万亿美元的行业中最大的贷款机构提供资金来提高其对私人信贷的风险敞口。【原文：Banks are upping their exposure to private credit by funding the $1.7 trillion sector’s largest lenders, according to a report from Moody’s Ratings.】

item.title: 印度最富裕的矿区邦将于下月举行选举
item.description: 印度将于 11 月在其最富裕的马哈拉施特拉邦和资源丰富的恰尔肯德邦举行选举，印度总理纳伦德拉-莫迪领导的政党在今年早些时候的全国民意调查中受挫后，希望加强其在印度的执政地位。【原文：India will hold elections in its wealthiest state Maharashtra and resource rich Jharkhand in November as Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s party looks to strengthen its hold in the country after a setback in national polls earlier this year.】

item.title: 波音达成 100 亿美元信贷协议以增强资产负债表
item.description: 波音公司签署了一项价值 100 亿美元的信贷协议，以巩固其资产负债表，并抵御已使其西雅图制造中心关闭一个月之久的长期罢工。【原文：Boeing Co. entered a $10 billion credit agreement as it seeks to shore up its balance sheet and withstand a prolonged strike that has shut down its Seattle manufacturing hub for a month.】

item.title: 股市重现泡沫。美国银行称其为卖出信号
item.description: 人工智能股票正在飙升。比特币突破 65000 美元。就连特朗普媒体也在重新飙升。根据美国银行（Bank of America）最新的基金经理调查显示，市场泡沫的所有迹象都回来了。10 月份的调查结果显示，投资者的乐观情绪创下了自 2020 年 6 月大流感爆发以来的最大涨幅。股票投资激增，债券投资减少，现金水平从9月份的4.2%降至3.9%。有迹象表明，美国经济正在强劲增长，这助长了市场的看涨热潮。【原文：AI stocks are roaring. Bitcoin is above $65,000. Even Trump Media is surging anew. All the signs of market froth are coming back, according to Bank of America’s latest fund manager survey. Investor optimism registered the biggest jump since the depths of the pandemic in June 2020, the October responses showed. Allocations to stocks surged, bond exposure sank and cash levels fell to 3.9% from 4.2% in September. The bullish fever is being fanned by signs that the US economy is powering ahead as th】

item.title: 调查称，哈里斯或特朗普执政时的通胀和国内生产总值将相同
item.description: 无论卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）还是唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）赢得大选，美国的通胀和经济增长前景都将大致相同，不过彭博社调查显示，经济学家们认为副总统在整体经济方面更有优势。【原文：The outlook for inflation and growth in the US would be roughly the same whether Kamala Harris or Donald Trump wins the election, though economists in a Bloomberg survey give the vice president the edge on the economy overall.】

item.title: 看跌利率押注让巴西饱受打击的对冲基金获胜
item.description: 对国内资产的悲观情绪使巴西对冲基金在 9 月份取得了罕见的胜利。【原文：Pessimism with domestic assets earned Brazilian hedge funds a rare win in September.】

item.title: 塞内加尔即将退出监察机构的黑钱 "灰名单
item.description: 塞内加尔准备最早于下周从全球黑钱名单中除名，这对这个西非国家来说是一个潜在的推动力，因为该国正在推进改革，以应对洗钱和资助恐怖主义的风险。【原文：Senegal is poised to be removed from a global dirty-money list as early as next week, a potential boost to the West African nation following a reform push to counter money laundering and terrorist-financing risks.】

item.title: 世界银行顶级经济学家称尼日利亚奈拉几十年来最具竞争力
item.description: 尼日利亚的货币是几十年来最便宜的，这要归功于为使国家走上长期复苏之路而进行的痛苦但必要的经济改革。【原文：Nigeria’s currency is the cheapest that it has been in decades, thanks to painful but necessary economic reforms to put the nation on a long-term path to recovery.】

item.title: 印度央行副行长预计明年消费物价指数将在 "持久基础 "上实现目标
item.description: 印度央行副行长迈克尔-帕特拉（Michael Patra）表示，印度的通货膨胀率可能会在下一个财政年度 "持久地 "向4%的目标迈进。【原文：India’s inflation will likely move toward the 4% target on a “durable basis” in the coming fiscal year, the central bank’s Deputy Governor Michael Patra said.】

item.title: 中国落后于其他新兴市场，刺激政策疑虑引发分歧
item.description: 中国以外的新兴市场股市连续第六天上涨，尽管上海和香港股市受到投资者的打压，投资者担心迄今为止宣布的刺激措施不足以重振世界第二大经济体。【原文：Stocks in emerging markets outside China rose for a sixth day, even as equities in Shanghai and Hong Kong were pummeled by investors worried that stimulus measures announced so far won’t be enough to revive the world’s second-biggest economy.】

item.title: 德国投资者信心自 6 月以来首次上升
item.description: 投资者对德国经济的信心四个月来首次有所增强，原因是借贷成本下降的速度有望超过此前的预期。【原文：Investor confidence in Germany’s economy improved for the first time in four months on the prospect that borrowing costs will fall more quickly than previously anticipated.】

item.title: 欧洲官员称 T+1 过渡亟待开展工作
item.description: 欧盟监管机构周二表示，加快欧盟金融市场的发展应成为当务之急，因为他们希望赶上大西洋彼岸的同行。【原文：Speeding up the European Union’s financial markets should be an urgent priority, the bloc’s regulators said Tuesday, as they look to catch up with peers across the Atlantic.】

item.title: 美国银行调查显示全球股市乐观情绪闪现卖出信号
item.description: 美国银行（Bank of America Corp）的一项投资者调查显示，投资者越来越看好全球股市，也许是时候卖出全球股市了。【原文：Investors are getting so bullish that it might be time to sell global stocks, according to an investor survey by Bank of America Corp.】
